title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 27, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 27, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Pinned Gists
items.content_text:
### GitHub

*   [activity-box (⭐222)](https://github.com/JasonEtco/activity-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity of a GitHub user.
    *   [github-activity-box (⭐3)](https://github.com/maxchang3/github-activity-box) - A TypeScript rewrite of activity-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and using the GraphQL API to retrieve issues and PRs authored by the specified user.
*   [lang-box (⭐56)](https://github.com/inokawa/lang-box) - Update a pinned gist to contain languages of your recent commits in GitHub
    *   [recent-languages-box (⭐0)](https://github.com/liby/recent-languages-box) - A TypeScript + Bun rewrite of lang-box that updates a pinned gist with your recent GitHub commit language statistics. It offers improved type safety, customizability, and uses a more scientific approach to sorting languages.
    *   [github-lang-box (⭐3)](https://github.com/maxchang3/github-lang-box) - A TypeScript rewrite of lang-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and private repository access.
items.content_html:
GitHub

  • activity-box (⭐222) - Update a pinned gist to contain the latest activity of a GitHub user.
    • github-activity-box (⭐3) - A TypeScript rewrite of activity-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and using the GraphQL API to retrieve issues and PRs authored by the specified user.
  • lang-box (⭐56) - Update a pinned gist to contain languages of your recent commits in GitHub
    • recent-languages-box (⭐0) - A TypeScript + Bun rewrite of lang-box that updates a pinned gist with your recent GitHub commit language statistics. It offers improved type safety, customizability, and uses a more scientific approach to sorting languages.
    • github-lang-box (⭐3) - A TypeScript rewrite of lang-box, published on npm for easy GitHub Actions integration, with improved type safety, customizability, and private repository access.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### AI / Diagnostics

*   [julwrites/llm-nvim (⭐6)](https://github.com/julwrites/llm-nvim) - Comprehensive integration with the [llm (⭐8.9k)](https://github.com/simonw/llm) tool.

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [y3owk1n/time-machine.nvim (⭐37)](https://github.com/y3owk1n/time-machine.nvim) - Take control of your edit history with an interactive timeline, diff previews, taggings, live reloading trees and cleanup functions.
*   [OXY2DEV/ui.nvim (⭐143)](https://github.com/OXY2DEV/ui.nvim) - A blueprint/template/guide for customizing the UI.

### Motion / Diagnostics

*   [timseriakov/spamguard.nvim (⭐9)](https://github.com/timseriakov/spamguard.nvim) - Detects excessive key spamming (jjjj/kkkk) and suggests more efficient alternatives.

### Keybinding / Diagnostics

*   [TheLazyCat00/racer-nvim (⭐6)](https://github.com/TheLazyCat00/racer-nvim) - Overload ; and , with custom keymaps.

### Editing Support / Diagnostics

*   [TheLazyCat00/replace-nvim (⭐1)](https://github.com/TheLazyCat00/replace-nvim) - Replace part of your code with the contents of the `+` register using textobjects.

### Comment / Diagnostics

*   [soemre/commentless.nvim (⭐29)](https://github.com/soemre/commentless.nvim) - Fold all comments to better visualize your code logic, and unfold them whenever needed.
items.content_html:
AI / Diagnostics

  • julwrites/llm-nvim (⭐6) - Comprehensive integration with the llm (⭐8.9k) tool.

Utility / Diagnostics

  • y3owk1n/time-machine.nvim (⭐37) - Take control of your edit history with an interactive timeline, diff previews, taggings, live reloading trees and cleanup functions.
  • OXY2DEV/ui.nvim (⭐143) - A blueprint/template/guide for customizing the UI.

Motion / Diagnostics

  • timseriakov/spamguard.nvim (⭐9) - Detects excessive key spamming (jjjj/kkkk) and suggests more efficient alternatives.

Keybinding / Diagnostics

  • TheLazyCat00/racer-nvim (⭐6) - Overload ; and , with custom keymaps.

Editing Support / Diagnostics

  • TheLazyCat00/replace-nvim (⭐1) - Replace part of your code with the contents of the + register using textobjects.

Comment / Diagnostics

  • soemre/commentless.nvim (⭐29) - Fold all comments to better visualize your code logic, and unfold them whenever needed.

items.title: Awesome Free Software
items.content_text:
### Software / Command Line Tools

*   [Localizely (⭐5)](https://github.com/localizely/localizely-cli) - Open source tool that helps you sync localization files between your source code and the Localizely platform. ([MIT (⭐5)](https://github.com/localizely/localizely-cli/blob/main/LICENSE))
*   [Kit CLI (⭐1k)](https://github.com/jozu-ai/kitops?tab=readme-ov-file) - Open source MLOps tool that allows you to create, manage, run, and deploy ModelKits using Kitfiles. From packaging new models to deploying existing ones, Kit CLI lets you streamline workflows effortlessly. ([Apache License 2.0 (⭐1k)](https://github.com/jozu-ai/kitops/blob/main/LICENSE))

### Software / Web Applications

*   [DocuSeal](https://www.docuseal.co/) - A platform to fill and sign digital documents. ([GNU AGPLv3 (⭐9.4k)](https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal/blob/master/LICENSE))
*   [Tolgee](https://tolgee.io) - Developer & translator friendly web-based localization platform. ([Apache License 2.0 (⭐3.3k)](https://github.com/tolgee/tolgee-platform/blob/main/LICENSE))
items.content_html:
Software / Command Line Tools

  • Localizely (⭐5) - Open source tool that helps you sync localization files between your source code and the Localizely platform. (MIT (⭐5))
  • Kit CLI (⭐1k) - Open source MLOps tool that allows you to create, manage, run, and deploy ModelKits using Kitfiles. From packaging new models to deploying existing ones, Kit CLI lets you streamline workflows effortlessly. (Apache License 2.0 (⭐1k))

Software / Web Applications

  • DocuSeal - A platform to fill and sign digital documents. (GNU AGPLv3 (⭐9.4k))
  • Tolgee - Developer & translator friendly web-based localization platform. (Apache License 2.0 (⭐3.3k))

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Image Segmentation / Deforum

*   [FramePack](https://www.framepack.video/): next-frame prediction neural network structure that generates videos progressively
items.content_html:
Image Segmentation / Deforum

  • FramePack: next-frame prediction neural network structure that generates videos progressively

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:
### Applications / Blockchain

*   [tendermint-rs (⭐655)](https://github.com/cometbft/tendermint-rs) - Tendermint blockchain data structures and clients

### Applications / Utilities

*   [bloznelis/kbt (⭐356)](https://github.com/bloznelis/kbt) \[[kbt](https://crates.io/crates/kbt)] - A simple TUI tool for keyboard testing.

items.title: Magictools
items.content_text:
### Engines and Frameworks / Voxel Editors

*   :tada: [Box2D.NET (⭐58)](https://github.com/ikpil/Box2D.NET) - A port of Box2D, is a 2D physics engine for games, .NET C#, Unity3D, servers.
items.content_html:
Engines and Frameworks / Voxel Editors

  • 🎉 Box2D.NET (⭐58) - A port of Box2D, is a 2D physics engine for games, .NET C#, Unity3D, servers.
